definition: dioxin/also written 二惡英|二恶英
variant of 惡|恶[e3], esp. used in names of chemical components
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.english: Dioxins are unwanted byproducts of some industrial processes and waste incineration.
sentences.chinese: 二噁英是一些工業過程和廢物焚化的有害副產品。

sentences.english: Dioxins are a group of chemically-related compounds that are persistent environmental pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 二噁英是一組對環境具有持久性污染力的化學物質。

sentences.english: When this is done, chlorinated byproducts such as furans and dioxins are produced.
sentences.chinese: 當做到這一點，氯化副產品，如二噁英和呋喃的生產。

sentences.english: The establishment of Codex guideline levels for dioxins in foods is under consideration.
sentences.chinese: 目前正在考慮制訂食品中二噁英含量規定指導原則。

sentences.english: HC1 and PCDD/Fs emission can be reduced effectively by introducing calcium base.
sentences.chinese: 鈣基的加入可以有效降低氯化氫和二噁英的排放。

sentences.english: Although formation of dioxins is local, environmental distribution is global.
sentences.chinese: 儘管二噁英來源於本地，但環境分佈是全球性的。

sentences.english: Known examples are Dioxins and PCBs (polychlorinated biphenyls).
sentences.chinese: 已知實例爲二噁英和多氯聯苯。

sentences.english: The denovo synthesis of dioxins formation is introduced in this article.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了二噁英的從頭合成機理。

sentences.english: Dioxin is an industrial product known to cause cancer in high doses.
sentences.chinese: 二噁英是一種工業產品，大劑量的二噁英會致癌。

sentences.english: Dioxin is an industrial product known to cause cancer in high doses.
sentences.chinese: 二噁英是一種工業產品，大劑量的二噁英會致癌。

sentences.english: Some women worry about their personal exposure to dioxins through tampons.
sentences.chinese: 一些女士擔心會因爲棉條接觸到二噁英。

sentences.english: Dioxins occur as a complex mixture in the environment and in food.
sentences.chinese: 二噁英在環境和食品中以一種複雜的混合物形式出現。

sentences.english: In the environment, dioxins tend to accumulate in the food chain.
sentences.chinese: 在環境中，二噁英容易聚積在食物鏈中。
五氯苯酚中所含的二噁英正是污染物。

sentences.english: Airborne dioxin is not the only problem from incinerators.
sentences.chinese: 空氣中的二噁英還不只是垃圾焚燒廠唯一一個問題。
那些二噁英的書又在哪兒呢？

definition: dioxin, carcinogenic heterocyclic hydrocarbon (esp. Taiwan usage)
